properties.description: calculates days of stock per customer per product

source.sqlReaderQuery:
with
	tabela as (
		select 
		'competitors_sellout_monthly' as Origin,
		cast(Periodo as date) as Date,
		Regional as Regiao,
		Supervisor + Modelo as chave,
		Bandeira as Seller,
		--null as MeioDeDivulgacao,
		Marca as Brand,
		GrupoProduto as Product_Group,
		Modelo as Product,
		'Days of Stock' as KPI, 
		TotalVenda as Value,
		PosicaoEstoque
		from DatalabBrasil.dbo.SelloutMensal_EluxInfo smei
		where
			isnull(TotalVenda, 0) > 0
			and isnull(PosicaoEstoque, 0) >= 0 
			and Periodo between dateadd(month, -2, current_timestamp) and dateadd(month, 1, current_timestamp)
			--and Periodo >= dateadd(month, -2, current_timestamp)
	),
	rank as (
		select 
			rank () over (partition by Chave order by Date asc) as ranking,
			Date,
			chave,
			Value,
			PosicaoEstoque
		from tabela
	)
	select 
		tabela.Origin,
		tabela.Date,
		tabela.Regiao,
		tabela.Seller,
		null as '5NO',
		null as MeioDeDivulgacao,
		tabela.Brand,
		tabela.Product_Group,
		tabela.Product,
		null as Product_LCM,
		null as Corte_LCM,
		null as Tracking_Model_LCM,
		tabela.KPI, 
		--tabela.Value,
		--case when coalesce (r.posicaoestoque, 0) = 0 and coalesce(r2.posicaoestoque, 0) > 0 then 1 else 0 end as flag,
		cast((r2.posicaoestoque / r.value) as float) as Value 
	from rank r
	left join tabela on tabela.chave = r.chave
	left join rank r2 on r.chave = r2.chave and r.ranking = r2.ranking + 1
--	left join competitors on r2.chave = competitors.chave and r2.Periodo = competitors.Date
	where 
		case when coalesce (r.posicaoestoque, 0) = 0 and coalesce(r2.posicaoestoque, 0) > 0 then 1 else 0 end = 1

properties.description: This task uploads the data from ShoppingBrasilDiario from D-1.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select --top(100000)
		'competitors_sellout_monthly' as Origin,
		cast(Periodo as date) as Date,
		Regional as Regiao,
		Bandeira as Seller,
		Supervisor as '5NO',
		null as MeioDeDivulgacao,
		Marca as Brand,
		GrupoProduto as Product_Group,
		Modelo as Product,
		null as Product_LCM,
		null as Corte_LCM,
		null as Tracking_Model_LCM,
		'Stock' as KPI, 
		PosicaoEstoque as Value
	from DatalabBrasilDW.dbo.SelloutMensal_EluxInfo smei 
	where 1=1
		and Periodo >= dateadd(month,-24,current_timestamp)
	--order by 2 desc
		and PosicaoEstoque <> ''
union all
	select --top(10)
		'competitors_sellout_monthly' as Origin,
		cast(Periodo as date) as Date,
		Regional as Regiao,
		Bandeira as Seller,
		Supervisor as '5NO',
		null as MeioDeDivulgacao,
		Marca as Brand,
		GrupoProduto as Product_Group,
		Modelo as Product,
		null as Product_LCM,
		null as Corte_LCM,
		null as Tracking_Model_LCM,
		'Sales Units' as KPI, 
		TotalVenda as Value
	from DatalabBrasilDW.dbo.SelloutMensal_EluxInfo smei 
	where 1=1
		and Periodo >= dateadd(month,-24,current_timestamp)
	order by 2 desc

select top(2)'SellOut_Info' as Origin,cast(Periodo as date) as Date,Regional as Regiao,Bandeira as Seller,'-' as MeioDeDivulgacao,Marca as Brand,GrupoProduto as Product_Group,Modelo as Product,'-' as Product_LCM,'-' as Corte_LCM,'-' as Tracking_Model_LCM,'Sales Units' as KPI,TotalVenda as Value from DatalabBrasilDW.dbo.SelloutMensal_EluxInfo smei where 1=1 and Periodo >= dateadd(month,-24,current_timestamp)

activities.name: competitors_gfkbrazil_monthly
activities.description: queries the monthly gfk from datalab (temporarily)

source.sqlReaderQuery:
select 
		'competitors_gfkbrazil_monthly' as Origin,
		'BR10' as Sales_Org,
		cast(gm.[Periodo] as date) as Date,
		gm.Tipo as Region,
		null as Seller,
		null as '5NO',
		null as MeioDeDivulgacao,
		gm.MarcaGFK as Brand,
		gm.GrupoProdutoGFK as Product_Group,
		gm.Modelo  as Product,
		dgl.Item_LCM as Product_LCM,
		dgl.Corte_LCM as Corte_LCM,
		dgl.Tracking_Model_LCM as Tracking_Model_LCM,
		gm.[KPI] as KPI,
		round(gm.[Value], 5) as Value
	from DatalabBrasilDW.dbo.GfkBrasilMensal gm
	left join DatalabBrasil.dbo.DP_GFKBrasil_LCM dgl on dgl.Item_GFK = gm.Modelo 
	where 1=1
		and gm.KPI in ('Sales Units', 'Sales Value', 'Sales Value BRL ', 'Unw. Avg. Distribution Total', 'Wgt. Avg. Distribution Total')
		and gm.MarcaGFK not in ('<Tradebrand & Exclusive>')
		and gm.Modelo not in ('Trade Model') -- modelo especifico mas que no  aberto a marca do fabricante
		--and gm.[Pais] = 'Brazil'
		and Periodo >= dateadd(month, -6, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
		and gm.Tipo in ('Internet', 'Traditional', '<Grand Total>')
